WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
first aff all - > this is an amazing mod (and sorry for my bad english) :)
 
i'm using character profiler 3.0.1 to import my character in rawr 2.1.4 - the problem is, all information will be safe in the CharacterProfiler.lua, i've checked them (like equipped items, inventory and bank) but when i'm importing to raw,
only my equipped items will be displayed, but not the items i've stored at the bank. so i've to select my bank items manually to use the optimizer. is there a way to import them directly? 
 
as I've read this is no problem in the US version?
 
I hope someone can help me
 
greetings from germany - Bernd

Comments.Message: Can you please attach the CharacterProfiler.lua file?

of course, sorry 

there are at least over 90 items stored at my bank an i just noticed that some of my rings are normaly imported, hope that helps you.

i guess this is a localization problem, eventually, if there are only small text changes to do in the .lua, i would be very happy if someone can tell me what i've to change so that it works.

thx and some winter veil greetings to the whole team :)

i just want to let you know:

i've installed the enGB language pack - and when i export while english is activated ingame, there are no problems at all :)

that fixes my problem and that's all i want =) 

thank you for your help
